name: Dual Snake
description:
You are a snake. Not a normal one, though. Unlike the others, you were born with two heads.

Alone in an unknown underground place, you must find your way to the surface. For that, you have to learn how to use your unique movements, as you control both of your heads at the same time. Climb walls, open doors, push blocks, manipulate gravity and even find the mysterious magical food, as you challenge your wits and reflexes.Key Features
  • More than 50 official story levels to play.
  • Create your own levels and share them with the community!
  • Alternative playstyles as the game progress. Play with separated heads or even a single one.
  • No dialogs. Experience the story completely through gameplay.
